Posts.EditableText:
YourLocalCherriBerri is not a bot,
there are many advertising bots so it is easy to misunderstand

1. YourLocalCherriBerri is not advertising any "big website" keyword or off-topic links
2. YourLocalCherriBerri have a playable game
3. internet search (Change the username to anyone you want to check on)
type:
site:textadventures.co.uk/ "YourLocalCherriBerri"
4. From the internet search of 4 posts, we can see target username have no suspicious activities
